definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
Enjo-kōsai or "compensated dating", a practice which originated in Japan where older men give money or luxury gifts to women for their companionship and sexual favors

sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交際法有，過於恰恰相反注重語言在語境中的運用。

sentences.english: English, as a most popular language, its communicational function is more and more important.
sentences.chinese: 英語作爲世界最通用的語言，其交際功能愈顯重要。

sentences.english: He is a man of many contacts.
Large numbers of non-verbal noise exist in nonverbal communication.
sentences.chinese: 非語言交際中存在着大量的非語言聲音。

sentences.english: Mr. Liang is a very sociable person.
sentences.chinese: 梁先生是個很愛交際的人。

sentences.english: The quality training and teaching pattern study of college english reading;
sentences.chinese: 大學英語閱讀課教學中不可以忽視交際教學法。

sentences.english: This is an indication of Chinese culture′s positive acculturation in the intercultural communication between China and the West.
sentences.chinese: 這是中西跨文化交際中漢語文化順涵化的標誌。

sentences.english: This has manifested the language phatic function fully.
sentences.chinese: 這充分體現了語文的交際功能。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study of cultural difference is the base of the study of the difference of communicational behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究交際行爲的差異必須以文化差異爲出發點。

sentences.english: Kinesics is an important branch of the study of non-verbal communication.
sentences.chinese: 體語學是人類非言語交際研究中的一個重要分支學科。

sentences.english: The degree of hybridity is conditioned by the power of discourse and the effects of cross-cultural communication.
sentences.chinese: 譯文雜合程度受權力話語和跨丈化交際效果的制約。

sentences.english: To know paralanguage exactly is quite essential for successful communication.
sentences.chinese: 正確解讀副語言符號是交際成功的必要條件。
你瘋了似地拓展你的交際網。

sentences.english: Non-verbal, because it does not involve the use of words.
sentences.chinese: 之所以稱之爲非言語交際，是因爲它不涉及言詞。

sentences.english: This can be an issue that hurts inter-cultural relations.
sentences.chinese: 這種差異可能有礙跨文化交際。
